fullText:
Taunting Visage

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Changeling or doppelganger, avenger, oath of enmity power
Benefit: If you use your change shape racial power to assume the appearance of your oath of enmity target, you gain combat advantage against that creature until the end of your next turn.

Published in Divine Power, page(s) 136.
name: Taunting Visage
